name: Dealing with Governance
description: Governance can be a pain in the @$^ so why do we even bother? In this talk we'll go over why governance is worth dealing with, some of the well known high stakes issues, and some lesser understood pitfalls.

speakers.name: Payton Rose
speakers.bio:
Disc golfer, governance nerd, certified dreamer. 

After serving for over two years as Governance Facilitator at MakerDAO, I have embarked on the journey of governance design work. I have a passion for making things less terrible for all involved.
